Title: Relates to enacting the credit for rural broadband act
Summary: Provides for a refundable tax credit for costs paid for new construction of new broadband networks to residences and small businesses located in rural, unserved areas.
LawCode: Amd §104, St Tech L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law and the tax law, in relation to a refundable tax credit provided to broadband deployment to residences and small businesses located in rural, unserved areas
